nodes.text: Wroches were a food eaten on the planet of Kubindi. The indigenous, sentient Kubaz considered them to be a particularly succulent delicacy. In the year 0 ABY, when the Kubaz Udin returned to his homeworld with a number of bounty hunters, wroches were amongst several delicacies he claimed to be looking forward to eating.
Wroches were first mentioned in 1998 in Star Wars Missions 6: The Search for Grubba the Hutt, a novel written by Dave Wolverton as part of the Star Wars Missions series.
